alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Inland Wakulla; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 1:46PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN GULF...SOUTHWESTERN WAKULLA...SOUTHEASTERN LIBERTY AND FRANKLIN COUNTIES THROUGH 230 PM EDT/130 PM CDT/... At 145 PM EDT/1245 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Carrabelle, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Carrabelle, Eastpoint, Apalachicola, St George Island, Franklin, Carrabelle Beach, East Camp, Royal Bluff, Eleven Mile, St George Island St Pk, Beverly, Poplar Camp, Smith Creek, Bay City, Apalachicola Airport, Twin Pole, Hays Place, Fort Gadsden, Nine Mile, and Buck Siding. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Inland Wakulla; Liberty
